title: Caihong Xianzi Zhi Kuaile Mofa Pai
title_japanese: 彩虹仙子之快乐魔法派
synopsis: Clay Witch is a witch with strange magic. One day, she passed by Fairy Paradise and met Little Lemon. She made some magical jokes with Little Lemon on a whim, but she did not expect to give Little Lemon some new feelings. Under the kind invitation of Lemon, Witch Clay stayed in Fairy Paradise. The big hammer created a brand new beautiful melon house for Witch Clay, and the other straw people also prepared various daily necessities for Witch Clay. The straw people were curious about Witch Clay’s magic, and Little Lemon wanted to study hard, but Witch Clay never played cards according to common sense. In spite of constant conditions, Little Lemon, Clay Witch and Scarecrow still help each other in Fairy Paradise and live happily every day. (translaed from iqiyi)
